Html:
hi, I have seen a thread that shows some info windows onClick of the marker. that's exactly what I am looking for, but the thread has no code to start with, and I don't know much on gmaps, just started learning for future use.
what I want is something similar to google's info windows on markers in which you can put inner html in it. I wanted to put a control inside that info window. btw, I am using C#. thanks
you can try convert html to image and then render it like tooltip

radioman wrote:
you can try convert html to image and then render it like tooltip
not like that. i mean, if you look up on the info window tool in google maps api, it can be an inner html, meaning i can bind anything i want inside. what i am working on is a cgi/activex control that can stream video feeds from a dvr. is it possible to do it in gmaps.net?

to be specific, after i click the marker, an "info window" will show, and that window contains buttons, textbox etc. can i do that?
